title: ITC brand Fortune Hotels targets opening a new hotel every month in FY25
description: Elaborating on the challenges for India's hospitality sector, Samir said economic uncertainties, such as fluctuations in exchange rates, geo-political tensions, and global economic downturns, can impact travel demand and consumer spending, posing challenges for hotels in terms of revenue management, occupancy rates, and profitability.
